1.title: Episode #3.1

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: The Game Is On...Doggy-Style

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Seth Rogen says which celebrity he'd most like to smoke with; Snoop quizzes a pot farming party planner and a Pokemon master on the names of pot strains, and the winner spins the wheels for a chance at $25,000.

2.title: Wild Enough To Do It Doggystyle

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Kelly Osbourne shows how to do it the UK way; Snoop channels his inner soul singer and hosts a new morning show with Regis Philbin, and "gangtsa" knowledge is tested; a dental hygienist and a football coach compete.

3.title: What You Know Can Win Dough

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Supermodel Karlie Kloss brings the fashion facts, Michael Strahan busts a move, and Seth Rogen schools us on pots effects on our brains. A sommelier and a bartender take on the wheels to grab that $25,000.

4.title: The Cash Never Stops and the Knowledge Drops

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Snoop paints puzzling masterpieces, Wiz Khalifa and Snoop read Dr. Seuss books, and Snoop shows us why "black don't crack." A teacher and a brand ambassador go up against the wheel for a chance at $25,000.

5.title: Makin' Bank With The MC Of Swant

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Snoop and Method Man rock out to '80s hits; "Claws" star Karrueche Tran teaches about selfies; Snoop reads fairy tales; a cheerleader and hip hop hipster square off.

6.title: The Funkiest Hour On The West Coast

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Snoop and Regis Philbin croon rat pack tunes; Michael Strahan attempts yoga poses; Snoop reads hip hop soliloquies like Shakespeare; a theme park performer and a dancer compete.

7.title: Racks Gettin' Stacked

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Kelly Osbourne critiques runway fashions and Snoop performs on the cowbell; a history teacher and a twerking pop culture junkie have to guess what Snoop has just painted.

8.title: Use Your Brain And Make It Rain

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Michael Strahan shows us his hip hop moves, "Claws" star Karrueche Tran does the nails for the rich and famous, Method Man chews up the scenery, and Snoop drops some "pimpin' puzzles." The Winner spins the wheel for a chance at $25,000.

9.title: The Game For Playas

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Snoop gets deep and asks us which celebrity is a "crazy-eyed mofo." A math teacher and a personal trainer spin the wheels for a chance to win $25,000.

10.title: The Game's The Thing... And Cash Is King

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Snoop and Wiz Khalifa read us some Dr. Seuss, Method Man and Snoop do Eighties Karaoke, and Snoop gets his Shakespeare on. A dog lover and a pro gamer duke it out to win $25,000.

1.title: G's Up, Devil's Down

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Alright, alright, alright... we get "glazed and confused" with a special guest, and Paris Jackson shows off her "baby gifts." Snoop Dogg talks real dogs and goes deep with a real estate agent and a brand ambassador. The winner gets a chance to win $50,000 on Snoop's big-ass slot machine.

2.title: Homies Want to Win Money Too

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Biz Markie has a (song about) disease, RuPaul's on the red carpet, and Cheech & Chong get passionate with Snoop. An MMA fighter and a marketing specialist "hide the weed" and somebody gets to play Snoop's big-ass slot machine for chance to win $50,000.

3.title: Straight Outta TBS

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Adam Devine "gets his 80s on," Aubrey Plaza's "gotta halve it," and the "Fairy Doggfather" pays a visit. A drag racer and a college student must decide between "Yeezus or Jesus" and the winner gets a chance to play for $50,000 on Snoop's big-ass slot machine.

4.title: The Only Casino With Swag for Miles

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Adam Devine tells "yo momma" jokes and Xzibit is "all whitey, then," while Snoop goes deep with a graphic designer and a brand ambassador. The winner gets a chance to win $50,000 on Snoop's big-ass slot machine.

5.title: Give It While the Givin's Good

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: In this very special celebrity episode Aubrey Plaza tries to meld her mind with Snoop's and Wiz Khalifa's knowledge of rap groups and hair products is put to the test. Aubrey and Wiz get a chance to win $50,000 for charity. Plus, Adam Devine gets his 80s on, Michael Strahan gets down on "Sole Train," and Cheech & Chong get passionate with Snoop.

6.title: Jokers and Jokettes Wild

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Alright, alright, alright... we get "spaced out" with a special guest, and G-Eazy's brand-new raps are MONEY. Snoop takes us to church and makes it rain for a pastor and an I.T. guy. The winner gets a chance to play for $50,000 on Snoop's big-ass slot machine.

7.title: Watch It While It's Hot

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Dana White teaches us about "White history," Snoop takes us on a journey to "The Highlight Zone," and we find out where Kevin Smith's letters are at. Someone gets "dumped by Dogg" when a police officer and a customer service rep compete to play Snoop's big-ass slot machine for a chance to win $50,000.

8.title: Hide Your Remote

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Xzibit talks chick flicks, Aubrey Plaza's "gotta halve it," and Cheech & Chong discuss "who's highest." Snoop Doggowitz, Attorney at Law stops by, a singer and an account manager are quizzed on "gin and Jews." The winner gets a chance to win $50,000 on Snoop's big-ass slot machine.

9.title: From the LBC to Your TV

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Adam Devine tells "yo momma" jokes and "The Riddler" stops by. Someone tries to meld their mind with Snoop's, and a blogger and an analyst are quizzed on some cracking black actors from across the pond, pip pip! Somebody gets to play Snoop's big-ass slot machine for a chance to win $50,000.

10.title: Gambling with the Realest G

episode of.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Seth Rogen talks "Canadian bakin,'" Aubrey Plaza puts us under her "spell," and we help Kevin Smith find his letters. Snoop takes us to church and we find out "Who's the O.G." when a model and a marketing professional compete for a chance to play for $50,000 on Snoop's big-ass slot machine.

locations: Los Angeles, California, USA::(Snoop Dogg's Casino)
imdb.plot outline: TBS has teamed up with entertainment icon Snoop Dogg with Snoop Dogg Presents The Joker's Wild. Snoop Dogg, who counted The Joker's Wild as his favorite game show growing up, hosts TBS' new version set in his very own casino that includes a gigantic slot machine, giant dice and playing cards. The game features a variety of categories with a Snoop-a-fied touch and includes cameos by Seth Rogen, Wiz Khalifia, Karlie Kloss, Michael Strahan, Method Man, Regis Philbin, Kelly Osbourne and Karrueche Tran. Streetwise questions and problem solving, not just book smarts, rule the floor with all the action controlled by the one and only Snoop D-O Double G.
imdb.title: Snoop Dogg presents the Joker's Wild
plot: TBS has teamed up with entertainment icon Snoop Dogg with Snoop Dogg Presents The Joker's Wild. Snoop Dogg, who counted The Joker's Wild as his favorite game show growing up, hosts TBS' new version set in his very own casino that includes a gigantic slot machine, giant dice and playing cards. The game features a variety of categories with a Snoop-a-fied touch and includes cameos by Seth Rogen, Wiz Khalifia, Karlie Kloss, Michael Strahan, Method Man, Regis Philbin, Kelly Osbourne and Karrueche Tran. Streetwise questions and problem solving, not just book smarts, rule the floor with all the action controlled by the one and only Snoop D-O Double G.

Snoop Dogg, who counted The Joker's Wild as his favorite game show growing up, will host TBS's new version, which is set in his casino, complete with a gigantic slot machine, as well as giant dice and playing cards. Streetwise questions and problem solving, not just book smarts, will rule the floor, with all the action controlled by the one and only Snoop D-O Double G.
